DEG_PER_CM - Static variable in class irobots.motion.MotorController

DEG_PER_DEG - Static variable in class irobots.motion.MotorController
Deprecated.
 
DetectedObject - Class in irobots.vision
This class contains information about an object which has been detected by the robots camera sensor such as distance and angle to the other object as well as the colormap id of the detected object.
DetectedObject(Rectangle, int) - Constructor for class irobots.vision.DetectedObject
 
detectRobot(int) - Method in class irobots.vision.Camera
Attempts to detect the distance and angle to the robot with the given colormap.
detectRobots() - Method in class irobots.vision.Camera
Checks all robots if they can be detected and returns an array containing the information about the detected robots.
